Module.Text:
Vote

reddahers vote on which stories and discussions are important. the hottest stories rise to the top, while cooler stories sink.


Comments

comments can be posted on every story on reddah. comments add information, context, and humor.


Open Source

reddah is open source. community members are constantly tinkering and contributing features, bug fixes, and translations back to the site.


Community

anyone can create a community (called "subreddahs"). each subreddah is independent and moderated by a team of volunteers.
